parts.text: {"word":"engendrer","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"生み出す、引き起こす、発生させる","english_definition":"to produce, cause, or bring about; to generate","examples":[{"sentence":"La violence engendre la violence.","translation":"暴力は暴力を生む。","english_translation":"Violence begets violence."},{"sentence":"Cette politique risque d'engendrer des problèmes.","translation":"この政策は問題を引き起こす恐れがある。","english_translation":"This policy risks generating problems."},{"sentence":"La pauvreté peut engendrer le désespoir.","translation":"貧困は絶望を生み出す可能性がある。","english_translation":"Poverty can engender despair."}],"collocations":["engendrer des problèmes (問題を引き起こす)","engendrer la violence (暴力を生み出す)","engendrer la confiance (信頼を生み出す)","engendrer des conflits (紛争を引き起こす)"],"synonyms":["causer","produire","provoquer","susciter","déclencher","créer"],"antonyms":["empêcher","éviter","supprimer"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「engendrer」に由来し、ラテン語の「ingenerare」（中に生み出す、植え付ける）から派生。in-（中に）+ generare（生み出す、作り出す）に分解できる。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ɑ̃.ʒɑ̃.dʁe/","syllables":"en-gen-drer"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"indicative":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"j'engendre","2nd_person_singular":"tu engendres","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on engendre","1st_person_plural":"nous engendrons","2nd_person_plural":"vous engendrez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles engendrent"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"j'engendrais","2nd_person_singular":"tu engendrais","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on engendrait","1st_person_plural":"nous engendrions","2nd_person_plural":"vous engendriez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles engendraient"},"future":{"1st_person_singular":"j'engendrerai","2nd_person_singular":"tu engendreras","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on engendrera","1st_person_plural":"nous engendrerons","2nd_person_plural":"vous engendrerez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles engendreront"},"past_historic":{"1st_person_singular":"j'engendrai","2nd_person_singular":"tu engendras","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on engendra","1st_person_plural":"nous engendrâmes","2nd_person_plural":"vous engendrâtes","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles engendrèrent"},"past_anterior":{"1st_person_singular":"j'eus engendré","2nd_person_singular":"tu eus engendré","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on eut engendré","1st_person_plural":"nous eûmes engendré","2nd_person_plural":"vous eûtes engendré","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles eurent engendré"},"future_anterior":{"1st_person_singular":"j'aurai engendré","2nd_person_singular":"tu auras engendré","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on aura engendré","1st_person_plural":"nous aurons engendré","2nd_person_singular":"vous aurez engendré","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles auront engendré"},"conditional":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"j'engendrerais","2nd_person_singular":"tu engendrerais","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on engendrerait","1st_person_plural":"nous engendrerions","2nd_person_singular":"vous engendreriez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles engendreraient"},"past":{"1st_person_singular":"j'aurais engendré","2nd_person_singular":"tu aurais engendré","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on aurait engendré","1st_person_plural":"nous aurions engendré","2nd_person_singular":"vous auriez engendré","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles auraient engendré"}}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"que j'engendre","2nd_person_singular":"que tu engendres","3rd_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on engendre","1st_person_plural":"que nous engendrions","2nd_person_singular":"que vous engendriez","3rd_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles engendrent"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"que j'engendrasse","2nd_person_singular":"que tu engendrasses","3rd_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on engendrât","1st_person_plural":"que nous engendrassions","2nd_person_singular":"que vous engendrassiez","3rd_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles engendrassent"},"past":{"1st_person_singular":"que j'aie engendré","2nd_person_singular":"que tu aies engendré","3rd_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on ait engendré","1st_person_plural":"que nous ayons engendré","2nd_person_singular":"que vous ayez engendré","3rd_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles aient engendré"},"pluperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"que j'eusse engendré","2nd_person_singular":"que tu eusses engendré","3rd_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on eût engendré","1st_person_plural":"que nous eussions engendré","2nd_person_singular":"que vous eussiez engendré","3rd_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles eussent engendré"}}},"imperative":{"present":{"2nd_person_singular":"engendre","1st_person_plural":"engendrons","2nd_person_plural":"engendrez"},"past":{"N/A":"N/A"}},"infinitive":{"present":"engendrer","past":"avoir engendré"},"participle":{"present":"engendrant","past":"engendré"},"gerund":{"present":"en engendrant","past":"en ayant engendré"}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「engendrer」は、抽象的な意味合いで、何かが別の何かを生み出す、引き起こす、または発生させるという意味を持つ動詞です。物理的な意味合いよりも、結果や影響を生み出す状況を指すことが多いです。例えば、ある政策が特定の結果を生み出す、またはある感情が別の感情を引き起こすといった場合に使われます。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ Il a engendré un enfant.","correct":"✓ Il a eu un enfant.","note":"「子供を産む」という意味では、「engendrer」は通常使用されません。「avoir un enfant」がより一般的です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ La pluie engendre.","correct":"✓ La pluie cause des inondations.","note":"「engendrer」は、具体的な名詞を直接目的語にすることは少なく、抽象的な結果や影響を目的語にとることが多いです。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["engendrement (名詞: 生成、発生)"],"phrases":["N/A"],"priority":"N/A"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低い","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「Engendrer」は、ある事象が別の事象を引き起こす、または生み出すという、やや形式ばった文脈で使用される動詞です。日常会話よりも、議論や分析的な文章でよく見られます。たとえば、「暴力は暴力を生む」のように、抽象的な概念の因果関係を説明する際に用いられます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"La peur engendre souvent des réactions irrationnelles.","translation":"恐怖はしばしば非合理的な反応を引き起こす。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"引き起こす"},{"sentence":"L'inégalité sociale peut engendrer des tensions.","translation":"社会的不平等は緊張を生み出す可能性がある。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"生み出す"},{"sentence":"Un manque de communication peut engendrer des malentendus.","translation":"コミュニケーション不足は誤解を生む可能性がある。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"発生させる"}]}
